text: Lewis Niles Black (born August 30, 1948) is an American actor and comedian. He is known for his Comedy Central series Lewis Black's Root of All Evils and for his voice role of Anger in Disney Pixar's Inside Out and its 2024 sequel. He made a regular appearance on The Daily Show with Jon Stewart. Black was born in Silver Spring, Maryland. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Maryland Category:American critics Category:American movie actors Category:American playwrights Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Comedians from Maryland Category:People from Silver Spring, Maryland Category:Writers from Maryland
title: Lewis Black
